name: @sakuraapi/auth-audience
description: Middleware to support JWT audience role for SakuraApi servers

scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ ; tsc && npm run build:test
scripts.istanbul:run: npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run istanbul cover --include-all-sources node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js
scripts.lint: npm run build:test && npm run build && npm run lint:code && npm run lint:tests
scripts.lint:code: echo 'CODE LINT' ; npm run tslint -- -t stylish -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json
scripts.lint:tests: echo 'TEST LINT' ; npm run tslint -- -t stylish -c tslint.spec.json -p tsconfig.spec.json
scripts.prepublish: npm build && npm test && npm run nsp check
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run jasmine

author: Jean-Pierre E. Poveda
